CustomField.description: Field will be used to identify if delivery/start date is selected from the available dates fetched from asset availability API.
CustomField.label: Delivery Availability

value.fullName: Selected Delivery is as per WM Availability, selected date is within SLA days
value.label: Selected Delivery is as per WM Availability, selected date is within SLA days

value.fullName: Selected Delivery is as per WM Availability, selected date is beyond SLA days but within 30 days
value.label: Selected Delivery is as per WM Availability, selected date is beyond SLA days but within 30 days

value.fullName: Selected Delivery is NOT as per WM Availability, selected date is within SLA days
value.label: Selected Delivery is NOT as per WM Availability, selected date is within SLA days

value.fullName: Selected Delivery is NOT as per WM Availability, selected date is beyond SLA days but within 30 days
value.label: Selected Delivery is NOT as per WM Availability, selected date is beyond SLA days but within 30 days

value.fullName: Selected Delivery is NOT as per WM Availability, selected date is beyond 30 days
value.label: Selected Delivery is NOT as per WM Availability, selected date is beyond 30 days

value.fullName: Selected Delivery is NOT as per WM Availability, as this is a back dated order
value.label: Selected Delivery is NOT as per WM Availability, as this is a back dated order

value.fullName: WM NOT available to Deliver in the area, selected date is within SLA days
value.label: WM NOT available to Deliver in the area, selected date is within SLA days

value.fullName: WM NOT available to Deliver in the area, selected date is beyond SLA days but within 30 days
value.label: WM NOT available to Deliver in the area, selected date is beyond SLA days but within 30 days

value.fullName: WM NOT available to Deliver in the area, selected date is beyond 30 days
value.label: WM NOT available to Deliver in the area, selected date is beyond 30 days

value.fullName: WM NOT available to Deliver in the area, as this is a back dated order
value.label: WM NOT available to Deliver in the area, as this is a back dated order

value.fullName: Availability could not be confirmed as there is no response from the API
value.label: Availability could not be confirmed as there is no response from the API
